page.title: 08CHERRY BURTON-7
page.content: (CONT.FROM P.7)the foreseeable future- especially as it would be necessary to provide a new drainage and sewerage system.The newer houses can be roughly divided into homes for the middle/ senior management and executive classes and for the skilled artisan and lower management families.The social mix determined by the housing stock available ensures that there is a constant movement of residents,due to promotion or job re-location out of (or even within) the village,with younger married couples moving into the village. This should ensure the viability of the school(with the central Government cutbacks in education all village schools are under threat),the village shop and Post Office,but the bus service is at risk with the high ratio of private cars.
